description.narrative: The project development objective is to support the socio-economic reinsertion of demobilized ex-combatants within local communities.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Independent auditor, Schedule 2, Section V, 2, (ii) | Description :On or before three months after the EffectiveDate, the Recipient shall: (ii) hire independent auditors for the project with terms of reference, qualification and experiencesatisfactory to the Association and in accordance with Section III of this Schedule.

Finance Agreement :Workshop, Schedule 2, Section V, 2, (i) | Description :On or before three months after the Effective Date, theRecipient shall: (i) organize jointly with the Association a launching workshop for the project involving all stakeholders.
